channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Saturday Mash-Up! Live
channel.desc: Joe and Shereen are joined by stars of The Traitors - and one of them will be slimed! Cast members from CBBC?s Stage Stars share stories about their new series, and Joe and Shereen take on an epic digger challenge! Kidz Bop perform, and there is cartoon fun with SpongeBob Squarepants! Plus comedy from Awful Coffee and a look at one of this month?s biggest gaming releases in Eat Sleep Game Review.
